lgp.lib

Class BaseProgram<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>

  • Program
    • lgp.lib.BaseProgram<TProgram,TOutput>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class BaseProgram<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>
extends Program

    A built-in offering of the Program interface.

    Instructions of this program are executed in sequence and can be gathered from a single output register.

    • Constructor Summary

      A built-in offering of the Program interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseProgram

        public BaseProgram(java.util.List<? extends lgp.core.program.instructions.Instruction<TProgram>> instructions,
                   RegisterSet<TProgram> registerSet,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> outputRegisterIndices,
                   TProgram sentinelTrueValue,
                   kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super lgp.lib.BaseProgram<TProgram,TOutput>,? extends TOutput> outputResolver)

        A built-in offering of the Program interface.

        Instructions of this program are executed in sequence and can be gathered from a single output register.

        Parameters:
        sentinelTrueValue - A value that should be considered as boolean "true".
        outputResolver - A function that can be used to resolve the programs register contents to an interface Output.

    • Method Detail

      • output

        public TOutput output()

        Retrieves the program output.

      • execute

        public void execute()

        Executes the program.

      • copy

        public BaseProgram<TProgram,TOutput> copy()

        Creates a clone of the given program.

        When copying a program, a deep copy should be provided, to ensure that when a program is modified, it does not effect the state of other programs.

      • findEffectiveProgram

        public void findEffectiveProgram()

        Provides a way to find an LGP programs effective set of instructions.
